infos.value: So... How did it go?
Splendidly.
As expected, Mont will dash to Leonis Castle to rescue his dear Machérie.
He's under the impression that the rebellion has been postponed.
You mean Glaciela will be invading Wezette Castle without the help of Leonis's forces?
How easy this will be.
You're right about that. But alas...
...Alas?
Wouldn't it be boring to simply leave it at that? Hehe.
You have something else in the works?
I might.
Heeey. What's wrong?
Don't tell me...you're so hungry that you can't even move?
Oh, my apologies.
It's this snowstorm. We're simply a little chilled.
Chilled, you say? Then I could help you warm up...
Hmph. Warm them up, will you?
All right, then. Enjoy yourselves.
Ah... Learte...
We'll be leaving for the «Rubeus» hideout now.
Right, right, so please don't make a fuss over us.
Give Mont our regards.
